reuze.pending

Class MD2_Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.pending.MD2_Model

  • public class MD2_Model
extends Object
    This class represents a MD2 model. The MD2_Loader class should be used to create object of this class.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MD2_Model(processing.core.PApplet app, int numFrames, int numXYZ, int frameSize, gb_Vector3[] points, gb_Vector3 modOffset, gb_Vector3 modSize, int[] glCommand, MD2_Loader.GL_Vertex[] vertex, processing.core.PImage modelTex, MD2_ModelState[] state)
      This ctor should only be called from the loader class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void centreModel()
      Centers the model so it evenly spaced over (0,0,0) Note: this will change all the XYZ points in the model
      void centreModel(gb_Vector3 offset)
      Centers the model so it evenly spaced over a given offset useful if we have 2 linked models.
      MD2_ModelState[] getModelStates()
      Allows user to get and use any animation states available
      gb_Vector3 getModOffset()
      Get the offset of the model center from (0,0,0)
      gb_Vector3 getModSize()
      Get the size of the model
      float getPosition()
      Gets the current animation position.
      MD2_ModelState getState(int stateNo)
      get a particular animation state
      int memUsage()
      Calculate the model memory requirements excluding textures.
      void render()
      Render the model
      void scaleModel(float f)
      Scales the model Note: this will change all the XYZ points in the model
      void setState(int stateNo)
      Set the model state to be rendered
      String toString()
      Display the model statistics and memory usage
      void update(float percent)
      Update the interpolation value so that the model is animated by incrementing the interpolation value by percent

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • getPosition

        public float getPosition()
        Gets the current animation position. Integer part is frame number and fractional part is interpolation value to next frame.

        public void update(float percent)
        Update the interpolation value so that the model is animated by incrementing the interpolation value by percent
        Parameters:
        percent - MUSt be in the range >=0.0 and < 1.0
